27#include "includes.h"
28__RCSID("$NetBSD: progressmeter.c,v 1.11 2019/04/20 17:16:40 christos Exp $");
29#include <sys/types.h>
30#include <sys/ioctl.h>
31#include <sys/uio.h>
32
33#include <errno.h>
34#include <signal.h>
35#include <stdarg.h>
36#include <stdio.h>
37#include <string.h>
38#include <time.h>
39#include <unistd.h>
40
41#include "progressmeter.h"
42#include "atomicio.h"
43#include "misc.h"
44#include "utf8.h"
45
46#define DEFAULT_WINSIZE 80
47#define MAX_WINSIZE 512
48#define PADDING 1 /* padding between the progress indicators */
49#define UPDATE_INTERVAL 1 /* update the progress meter every second */
50#define STALL_TIME 5 /* we're stalled after this many seconds */
51
52/* determines whether we can output to the terminal */
53static int can_output(void);
54
55/* formats and inserts the specified size into the given buffer */
56static void format_size(char *, int, off_t);
57static void format_rate(char *, int, off_t);
58
59/* window resizing */
60static void sig_winch(int);
61static void setscreensize(void);
62
63/* signal handler for updating the progress meter */
64static void sig_alarm(int);
65
66static double start; /* start progress */
67static double last_update; /* last progress update */
68static const char *file; /* name of the file being transferred */
69static off_t start_pos; /* initial position of transfer */
70static off_t end_pos; /* ending position of transfer */
71static off_t cur_pos; /* transfer position as of last refresh */
72static off_t last_pos;
73static off_t max_delta_pos = 0;
74static volatile off_t *counter; /* progress counter */
75static long stalled; /* how long we have been stalled */
76static int bytes_per_second; /* current speed in bytes per second */
77static int win_size; /* terminal window size */
78static volatile sig_atomic_t win_resized; /* for window resizing */
79static volatile sig_atomic_t alarm_fired;
80
81/* units for format_size */
82static const char unit[] = " KMGT";
83
84static int
85can_output(void)
86{
87 return (getpgrp() == tcgetpgrp(STDOUT_FILENO));
88}
89
90static void
91format_rate(char *buf, int size, off_t bytes)
92{
93 int i;
94
95 bytes *= 100;
96 for (i = 0; bytes >= 100*1000 && unit[i] != 'T'; i++)
97 bytes = (bytes + 512) / 1024;
98 if (i == 0) {
99 i++;
100 bytes = (bytes + 512) / 1024;
101 }
102 snprintf(buf, size, "%3lld.%1lld%c%s",
103 (long long) (bytes + 5) / 100,
104 (long long) (bytes + 5) / 10 % 10,
105 unit[i],
106 i ? "B" : " ");
107}
108
109static void
110format_size(char *buf, int size, off_t bytes)
111{
112 int i;
113
114 for (i = 0; bytes >= 10000 && unit[i] != 'T'; i++)
115 bytes = (bytes + 512) / 1024;
116 snprintf(buf, size, "%4lld%c%s",
117 (long long) bytes,
118 unit[i],
119 i ? "B" : " ");
120}
121
122void
123refresh_progress_meter(int force_update)
124{
125 char buf[MAX_WINSIZE + 1];
126 off_t transferred;
127 double elapsed, now;
128 int percent;
129 off_t bytes_left;
130 int cur_speed;
131 int hours, minutes, seconds;
132 int file_len;
133 off_t delta_pos;
134
135 if ((!force_update && !alarm_fired && !win_resized) || !can_output())
136 return;
137 alarm_fired = 0;
138
139 if (win_resized) {
140 setscreensize();
141 win_resized = 0;
142 }
143
144 transferred = *counter - (cur_pos ? cur_pos : start_pos);
145 cur_pos = *counter;
146 now = monotime_double();
147 bytes_left = end_pos - cur_pos;
148
149 delta_pos = cur_pos - last_pos;
150 if (delta_pos > max_delta_pos)
151 max_delta_pos = delta_pos;
152
153 if (bytes_left > 0)
154 elapsed = now - last_update;
155 else {
156 elapsed = now - start;
157 /* Calculate true total speed when done */
158 transferred = end_pos - start_pos;
159 bytes_per_second = 0;
160 }
161
162 /* calculate speed */
163 if (elapsed != 0)
164 cur_speed = (transferred / elapsed);
165 else
166 cur_speed = transferred;
167
168#define AGE_FACTOR 0.9
169 if (bytes_per_second != 0) {
170 bytes_per_second = (bytes_per_second * AGE_FACTOR) +
171 (cur_speed * (1.0 - AGE_FACTOR));
172 } else
173 bytes_per_second = cur_speed;
174
175 /* filename */
176 buf[0] = '\0';
177 file_len = win_size - 36;
178 if (file_len > 0) {
179 buf[0] = '\r';
180 snmprintf(buf+1, sizeof(buf)-1 , &file_len, "%*s",
181 file_len * -1, file);
182 }
183
184 /* percent of transfer done */
185 if (end_pos == 0 || cur_pos == end_pos)
186 percent = 100;
187 else
188 percent = ((float)cur_pos / end_pos) * 100;
189 snprintf(buf + strlen(buf), win_size - strlen(buf),
190 " %3d%% ", percent);
191
192 /* amount transferred */
193 format_size(buf + strlen(buf), win_size - strlen(buf),
194 cur_pos);
195 strlcat(buf, " ", win_size);
196
197 /* bandwidth usage */
198 format_rate(buf + strlen(buf), win_size - strlen(buf),
199 (off_t)bytes_per_second);
200 strlcat(buf, "/s ", win_size);
201
202 /* instantaneous rate */
203 if (bytes_left > 0)
204 format_rate(buf + strlen(buf), win_size - strlen(buf),
205 delta_pos);
206 else
207 format_rate(buf + strlen(buf), win_size - strlen(buf),
208 max_delta_pos);
209 strlcat(buf, "/s ", win_size);
210
211 /* ETA */
212 if (!transferred)
213 stalled += elapsed;
214 else
215 stalled = 0;
216
217 if (stalled >= STALL_TIME)
218 strlcat(buf, "- stalled -", win_size);
219 else if (bytes_per_second == 0 && bytes_left)
220 strlcat(buf, " --:-- ETA", win_size);
221 else {
222 if (bytes_left > 0)
223 seconds = bytes_left / bytes_per_second;
224 else
225 seconds = elapsed;
226
227 hours = seconds / 3600;
228 seconds -= hours * 3600;
229 minutes = seconds / 60;
230 seconds -= minutes * 60;
231
232 if (hours != 0)
233 snprintf(buf + strlen(buf), win_size - strlen(buf),
234 "%d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, seconds);
235 else
236 snprintf(buf + strlen(buf), win_size - strlen(buf),
237 " %02d:%02d", minutes, seconds);
238
239 if (bytes_left > 0)
240 strlcat(buf, " ETA", win_size);
241 else
242 strlcat(buf, " ", win_size);
243 }
244
245 atomicio(vwrite, STDOUT_FILENO, buf, win_size - 1);
246 last_update = now;
247 last_pos = cur_pos;
248}
249
250/*ARGSUSED*/
251static void
252sig_alarm(int ignore)
253{
254 signal(SIGALRM, sig_alarm);
255 alarm_fired = 1;
256 alarm(UPDATE_INTERVAL);
257}
258
259void
260start_progress_meter(const char *f, off_t filesize, off_t *ctr)
261{
262 start = last_update = monotime_double();
263 file = f;
264 start_pos = *ctr;
265 end_pos = filesize;
266 cur_pos = 0;
267 counter = ctr;
268 stalled = 0;
269 bytes_per_second = 0;
270
271 setscreensize();
272 refresh_progress_meter(1);
273
274 signal(SIGALRM, sig_alarm);
275 signal(SIGWINCH, sig_winch);
276 alarm(UPDATE_INTERVAL);
277}
278
279void
280stop_progress_meter(void)
281{
282 alarm(0);
283
284 if (!can_output())
285 return;
286
287 /* Ensure we complete the progress */
288 if (cur_pos != end_pos)
289 refresh_progress_meter(1);
290
291 atomicio(vwrite, STDOUT_FILENO, __UNCONST("\n"), 1);
292}
293
294/*ARGSUSED*/
295static void
296sig_winch(int sig)
297{
298 signal(SIGWINCH, sig_winch);
299 win_resized = 1;
300}
301
302static void
303setscreensize(void)
304{
305 struct winsize winsize;
306
307 if (ioctl(STDOUT_FILENO, TIOCGWINSZ, &winsize) != -1 &&
308 winsize.ws_col != 0) {
309 if (winsize.ws_col > MAX_WINSIZE)
310 win_size = MAX_WINSIZE;
311 else
312 win_size = winsize.ws_col;
313 } else
314 win_size = DEFAULT_WINSIZE;
315 win_size += 1; /* trailing \0 */
316}
